name: Latex Symbol Search
tagline: A Flashlight plugin for finding LaTeX symbol syntax
body:
A plugin for the Mac app [Flashlight](http://flashlight.nateparrott.com) that allows you to search for symbols and find their LaTeX command. ![LaTeX Symbol Search screenshot](http://www.prudhviboyapalli.com/images/LatexSerachScreenshot.png) ### Installation If you do not have Flashlight install, follow the instructions [here](http://flashlight.nateparrott.com). In the Flashlight app, search for Latex Symbol Search and install the plugin. ### Usage The plugin can be triggered by typing either `tex` or `latex` into the Spotlight search bar. Follow the keyword with the symbol you wish to search for. 
tex pi
latex arrow
![LaTeX Symbol Search screenshot](http://www.prudhviboyapalli.com/images/LatexSerachScreenshot.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
